mapper.select: select from jixiaobiao order by jbh desc
mapper.update:
update jixiaobiao
jnr=#{jnr},
jmc=#{jmc},
where jbh=#{jbh}
mapper.select: select j.jmc,j.jnr,p.jxbh,p.jbh,p.ybh,p.jxsj,p.jxfs,d.jdjb,d.jdfs,r.rzname from jixiaobiao j inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on j.jbh=p.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join jixiaodinjibiao d on d.jxbh=p.jxbh where p.jxfs!=0 and DATE_FORMAT(p.jxsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m') order by jxbh desc

select j.jmc,j.jnr,p.jxbh,p.jbh,p.ybh,p.jxsj,p.jxfs,d.jdjb,d.jdfs,r.rzname from jixiaobiao j inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on j.jbh=p.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join jixiaodinjibiao d on d.jxbh=p.jxbh where p.jxfs!=0 and DATE_FORMAT(p.jxsj,'%Y-%m')=#{jxsj} order by jxbh desc

select p.jxbh,d.jdbh,j.jmc,j.jnr,p.jbh,p.ybh,r.rzname,b.bmmc from jixiaobiao j inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on j.jbh=p.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join jixiaodinjibiao d on d.jxbh=p.jxbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh where p.jxfs=0 group by r.rzname

select p.jxbh,d.jdbh,j.jmc,j.jnr,p.jbh,p.ybh,r.rzname,b.bmmc from jixiaobiao j inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on j.jbh=p.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join jixiaodinjibiao d on d.jxbh=p.jxbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh where p.jxfs=0 and r.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" group by r.rzname

select p.jxbh,d.jdbh,j.jmc,j.jnr,p.jbh,p.ybh,r.rzname,b.bmmc from jixiaobiao j inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on j.jbh=p.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join jixiaodinjibiao d on d.jxbh=p.jxbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh where p.jxfs=0 and p.jxbh=#{jxbh} group by r.rzname

select j.jmc,j.jnr,p.jxbh,p.jbh,p.ybh,p.jxsj,p.jxfs,d.jdjb,r.rzname from jixiaobiao j inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on j.jbh=p.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join jixiaodinjibiao d on d.jxbh=p.jxbh where r.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" order by jxbh asc

select j.jmc,j.jnr,p.jxbh,p.jbh,p.ybh,p.jxsj,p.jxfs,d.jdjb,d.jdfs from jixiaobiao j inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on j.jbh=p.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join jixiaodinjibiao d on d.jxbh=p.jxbh where p.jxbh=#{jxbh}

select d.jdjb,count(p.ybh) as empCount from jixiaodinjibiao d inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on d.jxbh=p.jxbh inner join jixiaobiao j on p.jbh=j.jbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh inner join zhiweibiao z on j.zwbh=z.zwbh where (DATE_FORMAT(p.jxsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')) and (p.ybh=1 or p.ybh=2 or p.ybh=3 or p.ybh=4 or p.ybh=5 or p.ybh=6 or p.ybh=7 or p.ybh=8 or p.ybh=9 or p.ybh=10 or p.ybh=11 or p.ybh=12 or p.ybh=13 or p.ybh=14) and z.bmbh=#{bmbh} group by d.jdjb order by p.jxfs desc

select d.jdjb,count(p.ybh) as empCount from jixiaodinjibiao d inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on d.jxbh=p.jxbh inner join jixiaobiao j on p.jbh=j.jbh inner join zhiweibiao z on j.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh where (DATE_FORMAT(p.jxsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')) and (p.ybh=1 or p.ybh=2 or p.ybh=3 or p.ybh=4 or p.ybh=5 or p.ybh=6 or p.ybh=7 or p.ybh=8 or p.ybh=9 or p.ybh=10 or p.ybh=11 or p.ybh=12 or p.ybh=13 or p.ybh=14)group by d.jdjb order by p.jxfs desc

select d.jdjb,count(p.ybh) as empCount from jixiaodinjibiao d inner join jixiaopinfenbiao p on d.jxbh=p.jxbh inner join jixiaobiao j on p.jbh=j.jbh inner join zhiweibiao z on j.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join yuangongbiao y on y.ybh=p.ybh inner join rencaizibiao r on r.rzbh=y.rzbh where (DATE_FORMAT(p.jxsj,'%Y-%m')=#{jxsj}) and (p.ybh=1 or p.ybh=2 or p.ybh=3 or p.ybh=4 or p.ybh=5 or p.ybh=6 or p.ybh=7 or p.ybh=8 or p.ybh=9 or p.ybh=10 or p.ybh=11 or p.ybh=12 or p.ybh=13 or p.ybh=14)group by d.jdjb order by p.jxfs desc
